name: helm-charts
body:
### Container Security Kubernetes Helm Charts
Helm must be installed to use the charts. Please refer to Helmâ€™s documentation to get started.
Once Helm is set up properly, add the repo as follows:

```helm repo add trendmicro https://dsgithub.trendmicro.com/chloel/helm-charts/helm-charts```

You can then run helm search repo trendmicro to see the charts.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
